item.title: Observability 101
item.description: Systems we build and maintain are becoming more complex and abstract with the increase in popularity of distributed systems, microservices, and cloud providers. With these new concepts, our view of failures has changed as well. We have to assume things can and will break when we do not expect. So we have to make sure it is possible to understand what is happening in our services it any given time
